article.source: The Laurel | "Fostering cooperation among legislative newspapermen (and women, and broadcast journalists, and bloggers, and media junkies)."
article.author: dubymcd
article.title: The Network Likes Ike
article.text:
A big move is in store for Fox61 alum Ike Ejiochi. He left the Hartford/New Haven market for WTTG in Washington two years ago, and now has been hired by ABC News as a Washington-based reporter. Ike’s other Connecticut connection is his Master’s in Sports Journalism from Quinnipiac. Congratulations.

The post The Network Likes Ike appeared first on The Laurel | "Fostering cooperation among legislative newspapermen (and women, and broadcast journalists, and bloggers, and media junkies).".
